info.name: Owner's Choice
info.attribution:

Lorc
- Queen's Crown https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/queen-crown.html

Syed Raheel
- Money Bag https://thenounproject.com/icon/money-bag-5505885/

Umer Younas
- Bank Note https://thenounproject.com/icon/bank-note-3947508/
info.description: Buy low, sell high, and make the right choice as a majority owner to come out the richest by the game's end
info.helpText: Have all players take a seat and then click the Setup button

clickRoutine.note: Reset the board squares ready to set the board up
Move the board 1 card to the active holder
Setup segment 1 from the board 1 card
Move the board 1 card to the discard
Move the card for segment 2 into the active holder
Setup segment 2 from the board 1 card
Move the card for segment 2 to the discard
Move the card for segment 3 into the active holder
Setup segment 3 from the board 1 card
Move the card for segment 3 to the discard
Move the card for segment 4 into the active holder
Setup segment 4 from the board 1 card

setupBoardSegmentRoutine.note: Select the card in the active holder
Determine which card face is active
Handle the card if it is the card for board 1
Handle the card if it is the card for board 2
Handle the card if it is the card for board 3
Handle the card if it is the card for board 4
